title: Manchester United ready to rival Arsenal, Chelsea and Liverpool for world-class star
text:
Man Utd via Getty Images 1 of 9 Who could Jose Mourinho target in the summer? GETTY Andrea Belotti has been linked with a move to Manchester United GETTY Jose Mourinho has sent scouts to watch Andrea Belotti in action 
But the same site claim Manchester United have now joined the hunt. 
Scouts from Old Trafford have apparently been sent by Jose Mourinho to watch the striker in action. 
The striker could join as an alternative to Antoine Griezmann. 
However, any deal is not likely to come cheap. GETTY Andrea Belotti is wanted by a host of European giants 
Belotti signed a new contract earlier in this season which raises his buyout clause to Â£84million. 
The Premier League quartet also face competition from Real Madrid to sign the Italy international. 
Italian newspaper Gazzetta dello Sport last week said talks between the Spanish club and Torino are due to take place this week. Related articles
